titleStmt.title: The nature, solemnity, grounds, property, and benefits, of a sacred covenant. Together with the duties of those who enter into such a covenant. Delivered in a sermon at Westminster, at the publique convention, (ordered by the Honourable House of Commons) for the taking of the Covenant, by all such, of all degrees, as willingly presented themselves, upon Friday, Octob. 6. 1643. By Ioseph Caryl, preacher to the Honourable Society of Lincolnes-Inne.
titleStmt.author: Caryl, Joseph, 1602-1673.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed by E.G. for John Rothwell, and Giles Calvert, and are to be sold at the Sunne in Pauls Church-yard,

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of original in Thomason Collection, British Library.
Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
